fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Sacrificial Sword__
Allows for 2 quick shield creations

__Freedom Sworn, Key of Khaj-Nisut__
5-star Limited Banner exclusive weapons, but provides substantial team buffs

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value: Favonius Sword, Sapwood Blade, Xiphos' Moonlight

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> HP%|<goblet> HP%|<circlet> HP% or CRIT Rate (if on Favonius Sword)

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Skill: Meow-teor Kick
**Optional)** Elemental Burst: Secret Art: Surprise Dispatch
**Not Recommended)** Normal Attack: Boxcutter

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: In a team that does not require Tenacity Of The Millelith's 4-piece buff (and same with Nobless Oblige), the 2-piece of HP% sets will be more benefitable as some dendro teams do not need ATK%. Instead, __Deepwood Memories__ or __Instructors__ is recommended.
